player.name: Russell Westbrook
player.physicalDescription: 6'3" point guard, known for his explosive athleticism, triple-double prowess, and relentless intensity. Powerful build, signature scowl.

figure.name: Absalom
figure.attributeDescription: Thick, long, and beautiful hair, so heavy it had to be cut annually and weighed over 200 shekels. A symbol of his vanity and, ironically, the instrument of his downfall.
figure.visualStyle: Renaissance painting, dramatic lighting, emphasis on beauty and tragedy.
figure.clothing: Royal garments befitting a prince, including fine linen robes, a gold belt, and possibly armor reflecting his role as a military leader.
figure.physicalDescription: Remarkably handsome prince, known for his flowing hair. Driven by ambition and resentment, he orchestrates a rebellion against his father, King David. Ultimately defeated and killed in a tragic end.

connection.narrative: One sought glory from the hardwood, the other from the throne, both with an unyielding hunger.
connection.relationship: Westbrook, known for his intense and sometimes controversial style of play, embodies Absalom's ambition and pursuit of personal glory, even at the cost of team harmony or established order. A confrontation between a star point guard and a would-be king.
